message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more fair price considering the market value.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value. However, this product offers unique advantages that go beyond the standard. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still thinking $9,000 is a good price. Can we meet at $9,500?
